about_the_game:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with a set of rare items and an exclusive Golden Epic for Billy Smithsonian. Unlock him if you don't already have him. Plus we'll also throw in 3000 Common Crafting Materials!


This pack includes:

  • President Billy Smithsonian himself (if you don't already have him)
  • The Alientech Light-Slicing Razor of Greatness (Golden Epic)
  • Two other Rare items for President Billy Smithsonian
  • 3000 Common Crafting Materials
